title: Easy Thai green curry
ingredients: ['For the paste', '1 stalk lemongrass (or 2 teaspoons prepared lemongrass)', '1 to 3 green chilies, to taste', '1 shallot', '1 to 2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground ginger (or 2.5cm piece fresh ginger)', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 tablespoon fish sauce', '1/2 lime, juiced', '1 handful chopped coriander', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '2 kaffir lime leaves', 'For the curry', '2 teaspoons oil', '4 chicken breasts, diced', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '2 kaffir lime leaves', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1/2 lime, juiced', '1 dash fish sauce']
